column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Next out was some kind of steak with bleu cheese with chips and stuffed mushrooms. The chips were crisp and browned
column2: just as I like them. The steak was cooked perfectly - the waiter said the chef usually cooks it medium
column3: but we can choose how we like it cooked. We told him however the chef recommends
column4: we will do that! The bleu cheese was a bit much
column6: so both my friend and I scraped it off. The mushrooms were stuffed with spinach and cheese of some kind and topped with bread crumbs. They were cooked to perfection. Still had a little bite to them but the mixture inside- YUM!
